import React, { useState } from 'react' import { ReactComponent as RedIcon } from '../../images/todaysIcon.svg' import { ReactComponent as ArrowLeft } from '../../images/icons_arrow-left.svg' import { ReactComponent as ArrowRight } from '../../images/icons arrow-right.svg' import { ReactComponent as Iphone } from '../../images/Category-CellPhone.svg' import { ReactComponent as Computer } from '../../images/Category-Computer.svg' import { ReactComponent as SmartWatch } from '../../images/Category-SmartWatch.svg' import { ReactComponent as Kamera } from '../../images/Category-Camera.svg' import { ReactComponent as HeadPhones } from '../../images/Category-Headphone.svg' import { ReactComponent as Gaming } from '../../images/Category-Gamepad.svg' import { ReactComponent as StarIcon } from '../../images/star.svg' import { ReactComponent as EmptyStar } from '../../images/star-empty.svg' import { ReactComponent as YarimStar } from '../../images/yarimstar.svg' import { ReactComponent as AdvShopIcon } from '../../images/adv arrow-right.svg' import { ReactComponent as ArrowUp } from '../../images/arrow-up.svg' import { ReactComponent as Heartfull } from '../../images/heartfull.svg' import { ReactComponent as HeartEmpty } from '../../images/heart small.svg' import { ELEKTRONIK, EXPLORE } from './electronik' import noutbuk from '../../assets/noutbuk.png' import boombox from '../../images/boombox.png' import advIphone from '../../images/adv-phone.png' import apple from '../../images/apple.png' import ps5 from '../../images/ps5.png' import women from '../../images/women.png' import speakers from '../../images/speakers.png' import perfume from '../../images/perfume.png' import AdvImgItem from './advImg' import { AllProducts, ArrowCircle, ArrowCont, Box, BoxCircle, ButtonChegirma, Card, CardCont, CardTitle, CircleDiv, CircleIcons, Container, Eye, FlashSalesDiv, FlashSalesText, HeartSmall, NewPrice, OldPrice, PriceDiv, Star, TimeDiv, TimeNum, TimeNumDiv, TimeText, TimeTextDiv, RedText, RedTextDiv, Line, TwoDot, BrowseCategoryCont, BrowseCategory, AddToCart, CategoryCard, CategoryCont, ItemCont, ItemText, Advertising, AdvCategories, AdvTitle, AdvCont, BoomboxImg, AdvCircleCont, AdvCircle, AdvCircleText, AdvCircleTime, AdvBuyNow, NewItem, PriceStar, CardExpTitle, StarDiv, ColorDiv, ColorSvg1, ColorSvg2, TopAdv, TopAdvText, TopAdvLine, TopAdvDiv, TopTextDiv, AppleImg, AppleText, TopAdvTitle, IphoneText, Voucher, ShopIcon, AdvShopNow, CircleArrowUp, NewArrival, ArrivalCont, ArrivalDiv, PlayStation5, ArrivalText, ArrivalShopNow, ArrivalDiv2, ArrivalCont2, ArrivalDiv3, ArrivalDiv4, ArrivalCont3, ArrivalShopNow2, ArrivalDivText2, ArrivalDivTitle2, ArrivalDivTitle3, ArrivalDivText3, ArrivalShopNow3 } from './style' export default function Home() { const [advImg, setAdvImg] = useState([ { id: 1, src: noutbuk, checked: true }, { id: 2, src: advIphone, checked: false } ]) function onChecked(obj) { setAdvImg(prev => prev.map(item => item.id === obj.id ? { ...item, checked: true } : { ...item, checked: false })) } function getrating(num) { const starList = [] const emptyStarList = [] const chalaStar = [] let son; for (let i = 1; i <= num; i++) { son = 5 - num starList.push() } if (son - Math.floor(son) <= 0.5 && son - Math.floor(son) > 0) { chalaStar.push() } else if (son - Math.floor(son) > 0.5 && son - Math.floor(son) > 0) { emptyStarList.push() } for (let i = 1; i <= son; i++) { emptyStarList.push() } let arr; arr = starList.concat(chalaStar, emptyStarList) arr.length = 5 return arr } return ( Phones Computers Smart watch Camera Head phones Gaming iPhone 14 Series Up to 10%
off Voucher Shop Now { advImg.map(item => ) } Today’s Flash Sales Days Hours Minutes Seconds 03 : 23 : 19 : 56 {ELEKTRONIK.map((elektronik) => {elektronik.buttonChegirma} Add To Cart {elektronik.title} ${elektronik.newPrice} ${elektronik.oldPrice} { getrating(elektronik.star) } )} View All Products Categories Browse By Category Iphone Computers SmartWatch Camera HeadPhones Gaming Categories Enhance Your
Music Experience 05 Days 23 Hours 59 Minutes 35 Seconds Buy Now! Our Products Explore Our Products {EXPLORE.map((explore) => {explore.new} Add To Cart {explore.title} ${explore.price} { getrating(explore.star) } )} View All Products Featured New Arrival PlayStation 5 Black and White version of the PS5
coming out on sale. Shop Now Women’s Collections Featured woman collections that
give you another vibe. Shop Now Speakers Amazon wireless speakers Shop Now Perfume GUCCI INTENSE OUD EDP Shop Now ) }
